title: Tsuma Netori Kan: Bijutsu Kyoushi no Baai

alternative_titles.en: Tsuma Netori Kan: Bijutsu Kyoushi no Baai
alternative_titles.ja: 妻ネトリ 姦 美術教師の場合

synopsis:
A gripping tale of desire, betrayal, and difficult choices. This story delves into the complexities of love and temptation, exploring how a moment of weakness can lead to life-changing consequences. With intense emotions and dramatic encounters, the characters face the reality of their actions, revealing the darker sides of relationships. An intense narrative filled with unexpected twists, emotional turmoil, and the raw exploration of human nature.

(Source: TMDB)
